sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it it given that
\[
	7 p - 9 q = 6 p + 10 q 
\]
Then find the value of the following expressions.
\[
	\frac{7 p + 6 q }{7 p - 6 q }
\]
\[
	\frac{3 p ^2 + 9 q ^2 }{3 p ^2 - 9 q ^2}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	7 p - 9 q = 6 p + 10 q 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \input[s1v1]{} p = 19 \input[s1v2]{}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p }{\input[s2v1]{} } = \frac{\input[s2v2]{} }{1 } = \frac{19 }{1 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Now, multiplying the above equation with $\frac{7 }{6 }$ on both sides, we get}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s3v1]{} p }{6 q } = \frac{\input[s3v2]{} }{6 }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo rule, we get
\[
	\frac{7 p + 6 \input[s4v1]{} }{7 p - 6 q } = \frac{133 + 
	6 }{133 - \input[s4v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{7 p + 6 q }{7 p - 6 q } = \frac{139 }{127 }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Now, lets square the expression of $\frac{p }{q }$}$$
\[
	\frac{p ^2 }{q ^2 } = \frac{\input[s5v1]{}}{1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{3 p ^2 }{9 q ^2 } = \frac{1083 }{\input[s5v2]{}}
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{3 p ^2 + 9 q ^2 }{3 p ^2 - \input[s6v1]{} q ^2} = \frac{1083 + 9 }{\input[s6v2]{} - 9 }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{3 p ^2 + 9 q ^2 }{3 p ^2 - 9 q ^2} = \frac{\input[s7v1]{} }{\input[s7v2]{} }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [1, "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification of $7 p - 9 q = 6 p + 10 q$ we get $1 p = 19 q$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", 19], "text": "$$\text{Dividing both sides by $q$, we get $\frac{p }{q } = \frac{19 }{1 }$}$$"}, {"data": [7, 133], "text": ""}, {"data": ["q", 6], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo rule on the previous equation we get $\frac{7 p + 6 q }{7 p - 6 q } = \frac{139 }{127 }$}$$"}, {"data": [361, 9], "text": "$$\text{Upon squaring $\frac{p }{q }$, and multiplying numerator and denominator by $3$ and $9$ respectively, we get $ \frac{3 p ^2 }{9 q ^2 } = \frac{1083 }{9 }$}$$"}, {"data": [9, 1083], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo on the previous equation we get $\frac{3 p ^2 + 9 q ^2 }{3 p ^2 - 9 q ^2} = \frac{1083 + 9 }{1083 - 9 }$}$$"}, {"data": [182, 179], "text": " "}]
